timeline.bodyText: Is it worth doing output = null after this to avoid keeping a reference to the output in a field?
timeline.author: efge

replies.bodyText: The operation callback is referenced by the context which is referenced by the thread that handles the chain execution so I'd expect it to be ready for GC once execution is done, no?
replies.author: nelsonsilva

replies.bodyText: Yes if it doesn't last longer than that then no need for manual "cleanup".
replies.author: efge
